description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the security feature bypass vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-30040:

1. Download and install the appropriate update package related to your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog links provided below.
2. Ensure that your system meets the build number requirements prior to installation.
3. Reboot your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- For the Windows 10 and 11 versions, applicable KB Articles are: KB5037788, KB5037770, KB5037768, KB5037771.
- Ensure your system matches one of the following build numbers before proceeding:
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.10240.20651
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3593
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the links:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that you are running a verifiable version of Windows (10 or 11) and match the corresponding build numbers listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding to avoid any potential data loss.
